Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Reroute at Pulaski/Montrose
ShortDescription: 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Irving Park, Kedzie, Lawrence & Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/Montrose.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, Irving Park, Kedzie, Lawrence then resume their normal route on Pulaski, due to street blockage near Pulaski/Montrose.

Allow extra travel time.
